A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I understand the pain most super fans feel after watching this movie\, however just because a film doesn't live up to your expectations\, is new\, or recreates the feeling you got whilst watching the originals doesn't make it a bad film. I am not saying this film is perfect\, it has flaws\, the subplot was out of tone and few characters were thrown in with no character development or story purpose. In the end this film remains memorable and fresh.
